title: Jobify - AI-Powered Job Platform
description: A comprehensive job discovery platform that leverages AI for intelligent matching. It uses fuzzy matching and cosine similarity to connect candidates with the right opportunities, supported by a microservices architecture with Node.js and FastAPI, and real-time updates via WebSockets.

title: Task360 - Collaborative Project Management
description: A SaaS platform designed for modern teams to collaborate, manage projects, and track tasks in real-time. Features a responsive Next.js frontend and a robust Node.js backend with WebSocket integration for instant updates.

title: AI Application Suite
description: A collection of practical machine learning applications, including a movie recommendation engine, a spam detector, a house price predictor, and an automated complaint management system, showcasing diverse ML model implementations.

title: XpertApp - Enterprise Transaction Dashboard
description: An internal enterprise dashboard developed to provide stakeholders with advanced analytics and visualizations for complex transaction reports. Built with a highly responsive and modern Angular and Tailwind CSS frontend.

title: Estock - Automated Stock Report Processor
description: An automation tool for the finance sector that processes stock management reports from CSDL/NSDL. It utilizes a custom CNN model on a Node.js backend for high-accuracy data extraction from PDF documents, saving significant manual effort.

title: Behavioral Insights AI Platform
description: An AI-driven survey analytics platform that transforms raw text feedback into actionable behavioral insights. It uses LangChain with OpenAI models for advanced sentiment analysis, topic modeling, and intent recognition on a high-performance FastAPI backend.
